event.title: GPLv3 Workshop at Wizards of Operating Systems (WoS)
event.body: FSFE will organise a GPLv3 workshop at this year's Wizards of OS conference in Berlin on Friday, September 15th, from 17h00 to 19h00. Members of FSFE's sister organisation, FSF Latin America, will join Georg Greve and Ciaran O'Riordan to present the main changes proposed for GPLv3 and to examine to current state of the public discussion process.
